rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A welcoming entry with built-in eco-friendly LED lighting and natural stone finishes for energy efficiency.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: An open-plan living area combining the kitchen and dining space. Features include large windows with double-glazed glass, green wall installations, and sustainable bamboo flooring.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Integrated into the living area, featuring energy-efficient appliances, recycled countertops, and a water-saving sink.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace with eco-friendly natural light optimization and sound insulation for privacy.
